hero.hero_title: Over 18 Years of Excellence in Sourcing & Exporting.

intro.intro_title: From Parent Rolls to finished goods: Toilet Paper, Kitchen Towels, Napkins, and Facial Tissues tailored to your needs.

about.about_title: We are dynamic team of creative people
about.about_desc: We provide high-quality paper products for businesses worldwide, helping companies achieve their sustainability goals. We optimize production processes, making them more eco-friendly.
about.about_page_title: Yame is a Professional Supplier for Household Products
about.about_page_desc: The Main Products are Parent Roll and Finished Products such as Toilet Paper, Kitchen Paper, Napkin Paper, Paper Towel, Facial Tissue Paper, Pocket Tissue Paper etc.
about.about_page_content: For over 18 years, We are mainly working with china and vietnam mills. We supply all major grades for the away from home and at home markets, including bath, towel, napkin, facial, and specialty grades as Bamboo, Recycled etc that allows us to offer our clients a wide selection of optimal tissue roll solutions.
about.mission_desc: Providing sustainable, high-quality paper solutions that meet the evolving needs of businesses worldwide.
about.vision_desc: To be the leading global supplier of eco-friendly paper products, setting industry standards for quality and sustainability.
about.approach_desc: We combine innovation with traditional craftsmanship to deliver exceptional paper products while minimizing environmental impact.
